name: Chocolate Filled Vegan Pan de Muerto
description: This vegan pan de muerto is filled with a sweet chocolate "cream", and dusted with a sprinkling of sugar. Serve with Mexican hot chocolate
recipeIngredient: 1 Recipe  Vegan Day of the Dead Bread ((makes 4 small rounds))

recipeInstructions.text: Once you have baked your vegan pan de muerto. Let it cool completely. If it's not completely cooled down the chocolate hummus will not hold it's shape.
recipeInstructions.name: Once you have baked your vegan pan de muerto. Let it cool completely. If it's not completely cooled down the chocolate hummus will not hold it's shape.

recipeInstructions.text: Fill a piping bag with a star tip with the chocolate hummus.
recipeInstructions.name: Fill a piping bag with a star tip with the chocolate hummus.

recipeInstructions.text: Cut your pan de muerto in half (lengthwise), and pipe chocolate hummus on the bottom half of the bread. Place the other half on top, and serve.
recipeInstructions.name: Cut your pan de muerto in half (lengthwise), and pipe chocolate hummus on the bottom half of the bread. Place the other half on top, and serve.

keywords: day of the dead, pan de muerto, vegan
